name: GoGoo (GEAK)
description:
Help Goo to rearm and save his friends on time to advance and thus recover his entire clan to go and get some delicious pizza.

You would have to be fast, cautious and precise when you move, jump, climb and avoid al the obstacles that get in your way before it's too late.

COOL STUFF:
-100% Free.
-10 Levels.
-2 buttons only controls.
-1 Pizza per Level.
-Shakes.
-Slimes.

HOW TO PLAY:
Press the side of the screen you wish to move, release to jump. 
You can control the distance of the jump to shorten or extend it.
Also can climb by taping on the walls or even do wall jumps, all to avoid dangers, overcome obstacles and rescue your friends.

What are you waiting for? Just Play It.
